====== Activity Viewer ======
/* Please provide a brief description of the tool, and upload a screenshot if possible. Include details of the tool creator. */

The IATI Explorer Activity Viewer takes any IATI Identifier and provides a human readable page of information about it. 

Enter activity IDs at [[http://www.iatiexplorer.org/explorer/activity/]]
